visual_desc: INT. IRON THRONE HALL - NIGHT. A TIGHT CLOSE UP focusing exclusively on the heavy, ornate IRON CROWN resting on the brow of <King Aldric> (frail, aging). His skin looks pale under the reflection of hundreds of flickering candles. <King Aldric> (male, 70s, frail) attempts to lift a heavy silver goblet, his hand visibly TREMBLES, shaking the image slightly.
variation_reason: Compared to the first frame, there are only minor changes in the composition. The central subject remains the same, and the only visible motion is the internal action of the character's trembling hand affecting the image stability.
